metadata.title: CVE-2018-16487 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in lodash <4.17.11 where thefunctions merge, mergeWith, and defaultsDeep can be tricked into adding ormodifying properties of Object.prototype.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-lodash - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
node-lodash - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
node-lodash-packages - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-lodash package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.17.11+dfsg-4').
